#
# Build the module: `Lane`
#

cmake_minimum_required( VERSION 3.20 )

find_program(CCACHE_PROGRAM ccache)
if(CCACHE_PROGRAM)
    set_property(GLOBAL PROPERTY RULE_LAUNCH_COMPILE "${CCACHE_PROGRAM}")
endif()

set(VERSION 1.0)
project( UMTSM-Lane VERSION ${VERSION} LANGUAGES CXX)

include(GNUInstallDirs)

set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 23)
set(CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE Debug)

include_directories(${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})

# add_compile_options(-Wall -Wextra -Wpedantic)

# includes extra rules if any
if(EXISTS ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/CMakeExtras.cmake)
  include(${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/CMakeExtras.cmake)
endif()
if (NOT EXISTS "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Lane_Types.hh")
    file(COPY_FILE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Lane_Types.hh.template" "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Lane_Types.hh")
endif()

if (NOT EXISTS "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Lane_UserTypes.hh")
    file(COPY_FILE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Lane_UserTypes.hh.template" "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Lane_UserTypes.hh")
endif()

set(Lane_HEADER Lane_Types.hh Lane_UserTypes.hh )

#
# Build State Machine `Lane`
#
if (NOT EXISTS "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Lane_Auxilary.cpp")
    file(COPY_FILE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Lane_Auxilary.cpp.template" "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Lane_Auxilary.cpp")
endif()

if (NOT EXISTS "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Lane_DataType.hh")
    file(COPY_FILE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Lane_DataType.hh.template" "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Lane_DataType.hh")
endif()

if (NOT EXISTS "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Lane_DataType.cpp")
    file(COPY_FILE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Lane_DataType.cpp.template" "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Lane_DataType.cpp")
endif()

set(LIBRLane_SOURCE Lane_DataType.cpp Lane.cpp Lane_Auxilary.cpp)
set(LIBRLane_HEADER ${Lane_HEADER} Lane_DataType.hh Lane.hh)

add_library(LIBRLane_Shared SHARED
  ${LIBRLane_SOURCE}
  ${LIBRLane_HEADER}
  ${LIBLane_SOURCE_EXTRA}
  ${LIBLane_HEADER_EXTRA})
set_target_properties(LIBRLane_Shared PROPERTIES VERSION 1.0.0)
set_target_properties(LIBRLane_Shared PROPERTIES SOVERSION 1)
set_target_properties(LIBRLane_Shared PROPERTIES POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE ON)
set_target_properties(LIBRLane_Shared PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "Lane")
target_include_directories(LIBRLane_Shared PRIVATE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}")
if(DEFINED LIBLane_INCLUDES_EXTRA)
  target_include_directories(LIBRLane_Shared PRIVATE "${LIBLane_INCLUDES_EXTRA}")
endif()
if(DEFINED LIBLane_LIB_EXTRA)
  target_link_libraries(LIBRLane_Shared ${LIBLane_LIB_EXTRA})
endif()
if (CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "GNU")
  target_compile_options(LIBRLane_Shared PRIVATE "-O4")
  target_compile_options(LIBRLane_Shared PRIVATE "-fdata-sections" "-ffunction-sections")
endif()

add_library(LIBRLane_Static STATIC
  ${LIBRLane_SOURCE}
  ${LIBRLane_HEADER}
  ${LIBLane_SOURCE_EXTRA}
  ${LIBLane_HEADER_EXTRA})
set_target_properties(LIBRLane_Static PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "Lane")
target_include_directories(LIBRLane_Static PRIVATE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}")
if(DEFINED LIBLane_INCLUDES_EXTRA)
  target_include_directories(LIBRLane_Static PRIVATE "${LIBLane_INCLUDES_EXTRA}")
endif()
if (CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "GNU")
  target_compile_options(LIBRLane_Static PRIVATE "-O4")
  target_compile_options(LIBRLane_Static PRIVATE "-fdata-sections" "-ffunction-sections")
endif()

# End CMakeList.txt
